headline: Is EPAM Systems, Inc. (EPAM) the Best Mid Cap AI Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Mid Cap AI Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) stands against other best mid cap AI stocks to buy now. In 2025, the technology companies continue to focus on developing AI platforms that meet […]

headline: EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) Faces Shareholder Activism Amid Proxy Vote Solicitation
summary: EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) recently filed a preliminary proxy statement urging shareholders to vote against a proposal to amend voting requirements, reflecting ongoing investor activism. This move could have introduced uncertainty, contributing to the company's 3.63% stock decline over the past week. This decline occurs amid broader market pressures, where shares dropped due to tariff announcements affecting market sentiment, particularly impacting the tech sector, as seen with counterparts...
